errorResponses.403: API Limit Reached or API Key Disabled

nameTypeBatch.summary: Returns the type of  submitted proper nouns. Ex: John Smith = personal name, Namsor = brand name.

nameTypeGeoBatch.summary: Returns the type of  submitted proper nouns using their geographic context. Ex: John Smith = personal name, Namsor = brand name.

corridorBatch.summary: Returns complete analysis of  cross border interactions between two names using their geographic context. The sender is the one who initiated the interaction (from) while the receiver is the one intended to receive the interaction (to).

genderGeoBatch.summary: Returns the most likely gender of  first names and last names using their geographic context.

genderBatch.summary: Returns the most likely gender of  first names and last names.

genderFullBatch.summary: Returns the most likely gender of  full names.

genderFullGeoBatch.summary: Returns the most likely gender of  full names, according to their geographic context.

originBatch.summary: Returns the most likely country of origin of  first names and a last names. Note that the "Diaspora" endpoint may be better suited for countries like U.S.A, Canada, Australia, New-Zealand and other melting-pots.

countryBatch.summary: Returns the most likely geographic context of  full names (first names and last names) or surnames.

usRaceEthnicityBatch.summary: Returns the most likely U.S. race or ethnicity of  U.S. resident's first names and last names.

usZipRaceEthnicityBatch.operationName: US Race and Ethnicity ZIP Batch
usZipRaceEthnicityBatch.summary: Returns the most likely U.S. race or ethnicity of  U.S. resident's first names and last names, using their ZIP code.

diasporaBatch.summary: Returns the most likely ethnicity or diaspora of  first names and last names, according to their country of residence.

parseNameBatch.summary: Returns the most likely first name and last name structure of  full names.

parseNameGeoBatch.summary: Returns the most likely first name and last name structure of  full names using their geographic context.

parseChineseNameBatch.summary: Returns the most likely first name and last name structure of  full names (family names and given names) in Standard Mandarin Chinese.

pinyinChineseNameBatch.summary: Return the most likely Pinyin transcription of  full names (family names and given names) in Standard Mandarin Chinese.

chineseNameMatchBatch.summary: Matches  full names in Standard Mandarin Chinese against corresponding family names and given names in Pinyin.

genderChineseNamePinyinBatch.summary: Return the most likely gender of  family names and a given names in Pinyin.

genderChineseNameBatch.summary: Returns the most likely gender of  full names (family names and given names) in Standard Mandarin Chinese.

chineseNameCandidatesBatch.summary: Returns the most likely Standard Mandarin Chinese transcriptions using  family names and given names in Pinyin.

chineseNameCandidatesGenderBatch.summary: Returns the most likely Standard Mandarin Chinese transcriptions for  Pinyin first names and last names, according to their gender.

parseJapaneseNameBatch.summary: Returns the most likely first name and last name structure of  full names (family names and given names) in Kanji or latin characters.

japaneseNameKanjiCandidatesBatch.summary: Returns the most likely Kanji transcriptions for  japanese first names and last names in latin characters.

japaneseNameGenderKanjiCandidatesBatch.summary: Returns the most likely Kanji transcriptions for  japanese first names and last names in latin characters, according to their gender.

japaneseNameLatinCandidatesBatch.summary: Returns the most likely latin transcriptions for  japanese first names and last names in Kanji characters.

japaneseNameMatchBatch.summary: Matches  full names in Kanji against corresponding family names and given names in latin characters.

genderJapaneseNamePinyinBatch.summary: Return the most likely gender of  japanese family names and a given names in latin characters.

genderJapaneseNameFullBatch.summary: Find the most likely gender of  Japanese full names (surnames and given names), written in Kanji characters.

phoneCodeBatch.summary: Returns the most likely phone prefix, country of origin and format of  phone numbers using first names and last names.

phoneCodeGeoBatch.summary: Returns the most likely phone prefix and format of  phone numbers using first names, last names and geographic context.
